entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:29 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: SW 60 km/h gust 90 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
